profile.name: Munir Ahmed
profile.summary: Dedicated and results-driven Account Director with over a decade of experience in developing and executing strategic marketing initiatives. Proven track record of cultivating and maintaining strong client relationships, driving revenue growth, and leading cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional results. Seeking an opportunity to leverage my expertise in account management, strategic planning, and client satisfaction to contribute to the success of a dynamic organization.

descriptions: Spearhead strategic account planning and oversee the successful execution of integrated marketing campaigns for key clients, resulting in a 20% increase in annual revenue.
Fostered strong client relationships, serving as the main point of contact for key accounts, addressing concerns promptly, and ensuring client satisfaction.
Led a cross-functional team of 15 professionals, providing mentorship and guidance to achieve project objectives and deadlines.
Developed and executed comprehensive marketing strategies for a diverse portfolio of clients, resulting in a 15% average increase in client satisfaction.
Collaborated with the creative and digital teams to conceptualize and implement innovative campaigns, including social media, content marketing, and email marketing initiatives.

educations.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Marketing

descriptions: Successfully managed the rebranding efforts for ABC Corporation, resulting in a 30% increase in brand visibility and a positive shift in brand perception.
Directed the end-to-end launch of XYZ Tech's flagship product, coordinating with internal teams and achieving a 40% increase in product sales within the first quarter.
